definition: room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: The values obtained with toroidal cores at room temperature unless otherwise shown.
sentences.chinese: 无说明，各项数值均系环型磁芯在室温下测得。

sentences.english: At room temperature all the metals are paramagnetic.
sentences.chinese: 在室温时，所有的金属都是顺磁性的。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the rheologic performance and film-forming of the emulsion were inspected.
sentences.chinese: 研究了乳液的室温流变性并跟踪了乳液的成膜情况。

sentences.english: Mercury is an exception to the rule that metals are solid at room temperature.
sentences.chinese: 水银是金属在室温内为固体这条规则的例外。

sentences.english: This paper also discussed the mechanism of excellent stability of fluorine-containing organic radicals at roo…
sentences.chinese: 并讨论了含氟有机自由基的良好室温稳定性的机理。

sentences.english: Place the pie on a wire rack and cool to room temperature.
sentences.chinese: 烤好之后将派放在铁架上冷却至室温。

sentences.english: The room and high temperature mechanical strength of the hot-pressed B4C ceramic are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了热压烧结B4C陶瓷的室温和高温力学强度。

sentences.english: Suitable for oven drying and dry in normal temperature. For handbag and suitcase factories.
sentences.chinese: 可室温凉干，也可过烘箱，适合于箱包厂。

sentences.english: The RTP condition of fluorene and acenaphthene on the bonded filter paper was examined in detail.
sentences.chinese: 详细的考察了芴和苊在修饰滤纸上室温磷光条件。

sentences.english: The values were obtained with toroidal cores at room temperature unless otherwise shown.
sentences.chinese: 如无说明，各项数值均系用环型磁芯在室温下测得。

sentences.english: Under this condition, synthetic resin at room temperature measuring absorption deionized water rate.
sentences.chinese: 在此条件下合成的树脂于室温下测吸去离子水的倍率。

sentences.english: When not in use, store the bag in cloth pouch at room temperature.
sentences.chinese: 不使用时，请在室温下置于布袋中保存。

sentences.english: Self-drying lacquer at room temperature could be obtained, if a little cobalt naphthenate was added into the Product.
sentences.chinese: 若在产物中加入少量环烷酸钴可得室温自干清漆。

sentences.english: Do not leave lunch boxes in room temperature for more than 2 hours.
sentences.chinese: 不应将午餐餐盒放置在室温环境下超过两小时。

sentences.english: The mixture was agitated overnight on a magnetic stirrer at room temperature.
sentences.chinese: 一夜之间就被激动的混合物在室温下磁力搅拌器。

sentences.english: Cold solidifying surface anti-contamination agent of polished tile was prepared.
sentences.chinese: 本文研制了室温固化的抛光砖表面防污剂。

definition: to heat/to add warmth/to raise temperature/fig. to stimulate
refrigeration/cold storage/to keep (food, medicine) in cold environment
